001package com.github.sormuras.bach.command;
002
003import java.util.List;
004import java.util.Optional;
005
006/**
007 * The javac command reads Java declarations and compiles them into class files.
008 *
009 * @param modules Compiles those source files in the named modules that are newer than the
010 *     corresponding files in the output directory.
011 * @param verbose Outputs messages about what the compiler is doing. Messages include information
012 *     about each class loaded and each source file compiled.
013 * @param additionals Aggregates additional command-line arguments.
014 */
015public record JavacCommand(
016    ModulesOption modules, VerboseOption verbose, AdditionalArgumentsOption additionals)
017    implements Command<JavacCommand> {
018
019  public JavacCommand() {
020    this(ModulesOption.empty(), VerboseOption.empty(), AdditionalArgumentsOption.empty());
021  }
022
023  @Override
024  public String name() {
025    return "javac";
026  }
027
028  @Override
029  public JavacCommand option(Option option) {
030    return new JavacCommand(
031        option instanceof ModulesOption modules ? modules : modules,
032        option instanceof VerboseOption verbose ? verbose : verbose,
033        option instanceof AdditionalArgumentsOption additionals ? additionals : additionals);
034  }
035
036  @Override
037  public JavacCommand additionals(AdditionalArgumentsOption additionals) {
038    return option(additionals);
039  }
040
041  public JavacCommand modules(String... modules) {
042    return option(new ModulesOption(List.of(modules)));
043  }
044
045  public JavacCommand verbose(Boolean verbose) {
046    return option(new VerboseOption(Optional.ofNullable(verbose)));
047  }
048
049  @Override
050  public List<String> toArguments() {
051    var javac = Command.of(name());
052    if (modules.isPresent()) javac = javac.add("--module", modules.join(","));
053    if (verbose.isTrue()) javac = javac.add("--verbose");
054    javac = javac.addAll(additionals.values());
055    return javac.toArguments();
056  }
057}
